H2914.def: always as Q of {L:עֹפֶל<SDBH:עֹפֶל>}; exact meaning uncertain: = swelling of internal parts of the body or sores; ◄ probably due to infectious disease such as dysentery or bubonic plague; ≈ regarded as painful, enfeebling and threatening to a community

H795.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H5804.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H831.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the five cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H6138.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H5909.def: = generic term covering all small rodents, such as mice, rats, etc.; ► unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten; can become a pest when found in great number; ≈ possibly associated with bubonic plague

H4557.def: = an oral or written account of something

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H5633.def: = rod passing through the center of a wheel or set of wheels

H4013.def: = area that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6521.def: = population centers without fortifications ► and therefore hard to defend; ≈ possibly associated with living in security without fear of the enemy

H59.def: = a state of grief, caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances, and which is shown by one's actions

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1053.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H2572.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H56.def: = to experience grief and show this by one's actions; ◄ caused by bereavement, loss, or other difficult circumstances

H4347.def: = area of physical damage on the body; ◄ caused by an act of aggression

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1053.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6918.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H7157.def: = town, also known as {L:Kiriath-Baal<SDBH:קִרְיַת־בַּעַל>}, {L:Baalah<SDBH:בַּעֲלָה>}, and {L:Baale-Judah<SDBH:בַּעֲלֵי יְהוּדָה>}; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
